name: Ninja Run!
detailed_description:
Ninja Run is a game where you dodge pillars, take down enemies with swords and throwing stars, and get as far as you can go! Similar to the popular game Flappy Bird, but with 3 different types of movement, increasing difficulty, and enemies to take down along the way!

Earn currency for each point passed, and each enemy killed. Use these points to unlock new backgrounds, playable characters and soon to come much more!

Game currently Includes:

Five playable characters
Three playable environments
General gameplay
One gamemode


Planned updates include:

More characters and Backgrounds to unlock
Different abilities to replace throwing star
Multiple gamemodes to add variety
Power ups you can get in game
New enemies to take down
Steam Leaderboards
Mobile port
